title: Tassel, late 17th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core
description: Skirt of red silk covered with metal thread loop of two lengths, each supporting a brownish-red floss tassel. Collar at top of silk and metal loops. Head is covered with pink silk and metal in checkerboard pattern. Loop of red silk cord.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, late 17th century.Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core. 1908-2-9.
